long_description: The Roxy Sunset women's snow goggles offer a comfortable fit with a lens well-suited to cloudy or snowy conditions so you can carve confidently when the light is low. Amber-tinted lens has a 51% visible light transmission to perform best in cloudy or snowy conditions; lens boasts an antifog treatment and vents to combat lens fogging. Double-layer lens helps reduce fogging by creating a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and warm, moist air around your face. Cylindrical lens helps minimize distortion to ensure a clear, wide field of vision; antiscratch treatment helps protect lens. Durable frame is made of a flexibile polyurethane to provide a comfortable fit. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Helmet compatible design; adjustable strap provides a custom fit. Roxy Sunset women's snow goggles come with a microfiber bag that can be used to clean the lens; bag also helps protect the goggles when storing or traveling.
short_description: The Roxy Sunset women's snow goggles offer a comfortable fit with a lens well-suited to cloudy or snowy conditions so you can carve confidently when the light is low.
